original_text: Then they brought the golden vessels that were taken out of the temple of the house of God which was at Jerusalem; and the king, and his princes, his wives, and his concubines, drank in them.
korean_text: 이에 예루살렘 하나님의 전 성소 중에서 탈취하여 온 금 그릇을 가져오매 왕이 그 귀족들과 왕후들과 후궁들과 더불어 그것으로 마시더라

sentences.original_text: Then they brought the golden vessels
that were taken out of the temple
and the king, and his princes, his wives, and his concubines
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕과 그의 방백들과 아내들과 첩들이
